title: Test
subtitle: Subtitle
citation: Ott, Albert. (p. 20) “AKAN GOLD WEIGHTS.” Transactions of the Historical Society of Ghana, vol. 9, 1968, pp. 17–42.
quote: An important point about Akan gold weights is that the shape and decoration bear no relationship to the weight; a heavy weight may have the same shape or design as a light one. Weight owners however, knew the weight-value immediately they saw the design of one of their own weights.
